content:
Is this the proper venue for asking questions about how to import ballot comments received as a spreadsheet into JIRA?
@Lloyd McKenzie

That's best discussed under #JIRA/Confluence. Documentation is here: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/HL7/Importing+ballot+results+from+spreadsheets (and the mechanism to ask for someone to do it for you is a page nested beneath that)
